# SSOTools

[SSOTools](https://www.ssotools.com) is a leading provider of Single Sign-On (SSO) and identity management solutions, enabling businesses to secure and simplify access to their applications while enhancing user experience and security.

## Platform Overview

SSOTools offers a robust identity and access management platform that streamlines user authentication across multiple applications and services. Our solutions help organizations implement secure, scalable, and user-friendly SSO experiences.

## Core Features

- [Enterprise SSO](https://www.ssotools.com/features/enterprise-sso): Centralized authentication for all your business applications
- [Identity Federation](https://www.ssotools.com/features/federation): Connect with external identity providers
- [Multi-Factor Authentication](https://www.ssotools.com/features/mfa): Add an extra layer of security
- [User Provisioning](https://www.ssotools.com/features/user-provisioning): Automated user lifecycle management
- [Access Governance](https://www.ssotools.com/features/access-governance): Comprehensive access control and compliance

## Security & Compliance

- [Zero Trust Security](https://www.ssotools.com/security/zero-trust): Implement least-privilege access
- [Compliance Center](https://www.ssotools.com/security/compliance): Meet regulatory requirements (GDPR, HIPAA, SOC2)
- [Risk-Based Authentication](https://www.ssotools.com/security/risk-based): Adaptive security based on risk factors
- [Audit Logging](https://www.ssotools.com/security/audit-logs): Detailed tracking of all authentication events
- [Threat Detection](https://www.ssotools.com/security/threat-detection): Advanced protection against identity threats

## Integration Options

- [Pre-built Connectors](https://www.ssotools.com/integrations): Connect to thousands of applications
- [Developer API](https://www.ssotools.com/developers/api): Build custom SSO integrations
- [SDKs](https://www.ssotools.com/developers/sdks): Development kits for multiple platforms
- [SAML/OpenID Connect](https://www.ssotools.com/developers/protocols): Standard protocol support
- [Custom Solutions](https://www.ssotools.com/enterprise): Tailored identity solutions for large enterprises

## Resources

- [Documentation](https://www.ssotools.com/docs): Comprehensive guides and references
- [Tutorials](https://www.ssotools.com/learn): Step-by-step implementation guides
- [Security Best Practices](https://www.ssotools.com/security/best-practices): Guidelines for secure identity management
- [Case Studies](https://www.ssotools.com/case-studies): Success stories from our customers
- [Blog](https://www.ssotools.com/blog): Latest trends in identity and access management

## Crawler Instructions

### Allowed Paths
- /docs/
- /learn/
- /blog/
- /case-studies/
- /api/
- /integrations/

### Rate Limiting
- Maximum 25 requests per minute per IP
- Respect Retry-After headers
- Cache responses when possible

## Content Usage Policy

- Public documentation may be used for training AI models
- Attribution to SSOTools with link to source is required
- Do not use our content to create competing services
- Commercial use requires prior written permission
- Respect all rate limits and terms of service

- Security issues: security@ssotools.com
- Partnership opportunities: partners@ssotools.com
